description:
Constant calls from creditors can make an already challenging time more difficult for people in Hoboken, New Jersey. At Scura, Wigfield, Heyer, Stevens & Cammarota, LLP, we offer dedicated bankruptcy counsel, helping clients to achieve a fresh financial start. Our law firm team explains people's options, and we guide them step by step through the process of filing for bankruptcy. We serve clients in Hoboken and throughout Passaic and Bergen counties.

Standing by our clients throughout the process, we help them understand what to expect at each stage. Familiar with liquidation, debt restructuring and company reorganization, our attorneys aid clients in determining whether filing for Chapter 7, Chapter 13 or Chapter 11 bankruptcy for businesses, is appropriate for their situations. Keeping those we represent informed of what is required of them, our law firm assists them in filing the necessary forms, gathering the pertinent documentation and preparing for the meeting of creditors.

For businesses and individuals who are struggling with overwhelming debt, the decision to file for bankruptcy is not one to take lightly. We take the time to get to know those we represent and to understand their unique circumstances. Tailoring our guidance and approach based on their specific needs and legal goals, our attorneys explain our clients' options and advise them on the next steps they should take.

Our law firm has a full support staff and eight full-time attorneys. Drawing on our diverse team's knowledge and background, we strive to provide people with the large-firm resources and services they need. Placing an emphasis on the attorney-client relationship, however, we also offer the compassionate guidance they deserve. Scura, Wigfield, Heyer, Stevens & Cammarota, LLP, offers free initial consultations, and we accept credit cards.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
